entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

entry.title: [RBX/BHS][Backup Storage] - Firewall upgrade
entry.content:
Aug 23, 06:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 2, 22:32 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/08/2022 06:30 UTC
End time : 30/08/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Slowdowns (a few seconds) may be observed during the deployment on your specific server.
Service improvement : Following the incident that occurred during the maintenance in https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/c205tcjnl5q4, we've rollback the change and we are now ready to plan a new deployment.

entry.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - GRA0318A05A
entry.content:
Aug 23, 06:27 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 23/08/2022 03:52 UTC
End Time : 23/08/2022 06:18 UTC
Service impact : The vrack network in the rack GRA0318A05A is reachable.
Root cause : Incident caused by a failure on a cooling system.

Aug 23, 05:26 UTC
Identified - Start time : 23/08/2022 03:52 UTC
Service impact : The vrack network in the rack GRA0318A05A is still unreachable.
Root cause : Incident caused by a failure on a cooling system.
Ongoing actions : A replacement of the impacted switch is being planned shortly.

Aug 23, 04:22 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/08/2022 03:52 UTC
Service impact : The vrack network in the rack GRA0318A05A is unreachable.
Ongoing actions : A reboot of vrack switch is in progress.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - G102B02
entry.content:
Aug 23, 06:06 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/08/2022 05:59 UTC
Service impact : Some servers in the rack G102B02 are currently unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently investigating the source of this issue.

entry.title: [BHS7][Dedicated Servers] - B710A14 - B710A13 - B710A11 - B710A12 - B710A15
entry.content:
Aug 23, 05:47 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 23/08/2022 03:48 UTC
End Time : 23/08/2022 05:30 UTC
Service impact : All services are operational again.
Root cause : A hardware equipment failure.

Aug 23, 04:13 UTC
Identified - Start time : 23/08/2022 03:48 UTC
Service impact : IPMI loss in the following racks B710A14 - B710A13 - B710A11 - B710A12 - B710A15
Root cause : A hardware failure.
Ongoing actions : A reboot of ipmi AGG is in progress.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated servers] -Rack G114B07
entry.content:
Aug 23, 05:35 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 23/08/2022 03:10 UTC
End Time : 23/08/2022 03:30 UTC
Service impact : All servers in the rack G114B07 are operational again.
Root cause : A failure on a cooling system.

Aug 23, 03:27 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 23/08/2022 03:10 UTC
Service impact : Servers on rack G114B07 unreachable
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams investigate to determine the origin of the incident.
Root cause : A failure on a cooling system.
